posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a few rarer backs for my Cincinnati team set. Looking for low grade cards with no paper loss, trimming, or folds. Here are the backs I'm looking for:

[*]Broad Leaf - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Drum - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Hindu (Red) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
[*]Piedmont - Series 350-460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
[*]Lenox (Black) - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY
[*]Broad Leaf - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Carolina Brights - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Hindu (Brown) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
[*]Cycle - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*][STRIKE]Tolstoi - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY[/STRIKE]


PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], with anything available.

Thanks for looking, 

Steven

Grabbed #10 Tolstoi from a board member. I'll be back next month for one of the remaining 9. Feel free to send me what you have in the mean time. If its very desirable I can always put down a deposit.

Bump


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
